data.message: Help many of us have a language we can not navigate or read. !. How does this happen 2. How do we fix it??HELP

replies.message: Hey Georgia. You can learn how to change the language you see on Facebook here: http://bit.ly/2eoTq7G. Thanks. -Jessica
Facebook why do you post adds I cannot report or delete and which also suggest you somehow know my search history independent of your website?
Hey there :) my account Actopp.service@outlook.com cannot be signed in anymore, kindly let me know what happened? and the result is ?  thanks a lot.

Facebook my now daily request for clarification on what happens to those of us who are unable to install apps on our smartphones when you discontinue the mobile messaging site.  I do not understand the decision at all, to alienate a wide swath of your users who have not and cannot install apps.  It seems arbitrary and short sighted and frankly as if you don't understand how users interact with your site.  Looking forward to your response.
